description: Describes the default credit option for CPU usage of a burstable performance instance family. For more information, see Burstable performance instances in the Amazon EC2 User Guide.

nested_items.name: InstanceFamilyCreditSpecification
nested_items.description: The default credit option for CPU usage of the instance family.

nested_items.name: CpuCredits
nested_items.description: The default credit option for CPU usage of the instance family. Valid values are standard and unlimited.
